DOC.brief_summary: Centralized Pan-Algerian Survey undertreatment hypercholesterolemia . The purpose study establish proportion patient lipid-lowering pharmacological treatment reach LDL-C goal accord Third Joint European Task Force guideline survey population .
DOC.criteria: Subject must provide informed consent comply survey procedure . Subject lipid lower drug treatment least 3 month , dose change minimum 6 week . Subjects unwilling unable provide inform consent .
